Name: THOSE DAMN ALIENS! VR
About the game: A VIRTUAL REALITY SCI-FI SHOOTER Aliens have boarded your ship! Take up arms and battle waves of aliens in an attempt to save yourself in this VR wave based first person sci-fi shooter. Living alone on space research centre X34-Zelta, you work endlessly in an attempt to find an antidote to a deadly virus that has begun spreading among the human population. Only you can stop the invasion and find a cure. It's time to take arms, and fight back! Features Campaign Mode Survival Mode Multiple Weapon Types Online Competitive Leader Boards (coming soon) Stylish Sci-Fi Interface Realistic Graphics Immersive Audio Action-packed Game-Play
